nodes.text: The 8880 Limousine was produced by Ubrikkian Industries and intended for use as a pleasure craft and secure transport by the rich and famous. The passenger area was fitted with two large, comfortable benches and was well armored. The Galactic Empire employed these vehicles for transporting visiting officials and dignitaries. The Imperial Security Bureau office in Selkren on the planet Demophon had four 8880 Limousines in its motorpool.
